name: Mystery at Badger Villa
description:
A downloadable game for Windows, Linux

Yesterday Lilli Albright was a young professional living with a good-looking guy in a rather nice condo in a prime area of the city.

Suddenly she's single, sharing an apartment in a broken-down neighbourhood , and serving coffee and burgers in a shabby cafe.

Just when her life couldn't get worse Jack Bellwood, the newest tenant of Badger Villa is found dead in his doorway.

  Lili learns that Jack wasn't the only one on Badger Street with a secret.

She also learns that love and friendship find a way despite the most depressing circumstances.

Lilli's story has 3 alternate endings.
